title: How to better monitor your Ubuntu Linux PC's temperature and voltage

title: Singapore Airlines to offer free unlimited Wi-Fi onboard across all cabin classes
description: Previously offered free only for selected passengers, Singapore Airlines' inflight Wi-Fi service will be made available to all customers regardless of their cabin class starting July 1.
